name: Lepidoptera
effect: Apparition: Gain 1 power point. Deals damage based on rotation.

name: Owl
effect: While in play, adds +1 to the Wisdom of all your Creatures. Deals damage based on rotation.

name: Chiropter
effect: Each point of damage caused by it to the opponent generates +1 power point to the owner. Deals damage based on rotation.

name: Migration
effect: The Rival reduces all his Creatures 1 step.

name: Asteroid
effect: Gain +1 when defending if the opposing Creature has no summoned Knowledges. Deals damage/defense based on rotation.

name: Hurricane
effect: The opposing Creature cannot summon Knowledges.

name: Deslphinidae
effect: Appearance: Draw 1 card from the Market without spending Action. Deals damage/defense based on rotation.

name: Galapago
effect: Final: win 1 extra Action your next Action phase. Deals damage/defense based on rotation.

name: Ursus
effect: If the opposing Creature has not summoned Knowledges, it causes +1 damage. Deals damage based on rotation.

name: Serpent
effect: Apparition: Look at the Rival's Hand and discard 1 of his cards. Deals damage based on rotation.

name: Earthquake
effect: It causes as many points of damage as the wisdom of the summoning Creature.

name: Fire
effect: Rival Knowledges of wisdom [2, 1] or lower are eliminated.

name: Lupus
effect: Final: remove 1 summoned Knowledge of the Rival's Table. Deals damage based on rotation.
